recordTypes.name: Interment Reservation
recordTypes.description: This application is for reserving an interment location, and should be for an individual who is still living.

recordTypes.name: Interment Permit
recordTypes.description: A permit is required for interment or disinterment from any cemetery, regardless of ownership, within the City of Seward.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description:
Application for demolition permit. Must show proof of water/sewer, electric, TelAlaska/Fastwyre & GCI have signed off. 

No Fee. Cursory inspection when completed.

Commercial DEMO requires further information. 

This permit does NOT authorize the use of explosives for demolition. A separate permit must be issued for such use, per SCC ยง9.15.310.

Please contact the Environmental Protection Agency to ensure all state requirements are being met with regards to the handling and disposal of hazardous materials such as asbestos. You can call the EPA with your questions or concerns at 907-271-5083. For additional information about asbestos you may also log into: www.cicacenter.org/asbestos

recordTypes.name: Temporary Membrane Structure Permit
recordTypes.description:
Application for Membrane Structure Temporary Permit. Approval needed from Community Development, Public Works, electric Department, Fire & Building Department.

Permits are valid for a maximum of 180 days.

No Fee.

Fire Marshal will inspect once erected.

Caveat: Under 400 sqft does not require a permit

categories.name: City Clerk's Office
categories.content:
City of Seward Business Licenses

Thank you for your interest in doing business in Seward!

Seward City Code requires that all businesses operating within city limits obtain a city business license. The City Clerk's Office will process your business license application as quickly as possible. Please call us at (907) 224-4046 or stop by City Hall and we'll be more than happy to help you!
